tasks.title: Download EURUSD market data
tasks.description: Download 3 months of EURUSD daily data using yfinance. Save as CSV in workspace/. Report row count and date range.

tasks.title: Calculate technical indicators
tasks.description: Write a Python script (calculate_features.py) that reads the EURUSD CSV and calculates: SMA(20), SMA(50), RSI(14), MACD. Save results to eurusd_features.csv in workspace/.

tasks.title: Design SMA crossover strategy
tasks.description: Write a trading strategy (strategy_sma_crossover.py) in workspace/: entry when SMA20 crosses above SMA50, exit when crosses below. Define position sizing (1% risk), stop loss (ATR-based), expected Sharpe ratio.

tasks.title: Write backtest engine
tasks.description: Write backtest_sma.py in workspace/ that reads eurusd_features.csv and tests the SMA crossover strategy. Output: total trades, win rate, profit factor, max drawdown.

tasks.title: Create system health monitor
tasks.description: Write health_check.py in workspace/ that checks: disk space, memory usage, data freshness, log files count. Output a JSON report.

tasks.title: Backtest SMA strategy with historical data
tasks.description: Run the SMA crossover strategy through the backtest engine using the downloaded EURUSD data and calculated features. Generate performance metrics (returns, Sharpe ratio, max drawdown) and visualize equity curve.

tasks.title: Optimize backtest engine for speed and memory
tasks.description: Profile the current backtest engine (backtest_sma.py) for bottlenecks. Implement vectorized operations using pandas/numpy and optimize data structures to improve execution speed and reduce memory usage.

tasks.title: Add risk management module to strategy
tasks.description: Enhance the SMA crossover strategy by integrating stop-loss, take-profit, and position sizing rules. Implement a risk management class that calculates position size based on account balance and risk per trade (e.g., 1-2%).

tasks.title: Create automated data validation pipeline
tasks.description: Build a script that automatically validates new market data downloads. Check for missing values, outliers, and data integrity. Generate a validation report and alert if issues are found.

tasks.title: Set up basic CI/CD pipeline for code changes
tasks.description: Create a GitHub Actions workflow that runs automated tests (e.g., pytest) on pull requests to the main branch. Ensure the backtest engine and feature calculations pass basic unit tests before merging.
